name.zh: 拼色水桶单肩包（多颜色）

description.en: A compact bucket-style shoulder bag with a clean colorblock design and adjustable strap. Zip-top opening and a roomy interior make it ideal for daily essentials, commuting, and travel organization. OEM/ODM customization available for fabric (including recycled options), colorways, size, strap spec, logo patch, lining, pockets, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 拼色水桶单肩包，造型简洁耐看，肩带可调。顶部拉链开合，内部空间充足，适合日常随身、通勤与旅行收纳。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、配色方案、尺寸、肩带规格、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester / canvas-like fabric (customizable; recycled options available)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶/类帆布面料（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
闭合方式：顶部拉链闭合（可选 YKK）
肩带：可调节织带肩带（可定制）
五金：调节扣/D 环/挂钩等（可定制）

en.Customization: Fabric, colorblock design, size, strap spec, logo, lining, pockets, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 20–26cm × 高 18–24cm × 深 8–12cm（可定制）
zh.颜色款式: 多 SKU 配色（见 variants）
zh.可定制: 面料配色拼色、尺寸、肩带规格、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
